title: Black
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 24 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR80L
description: Magic shows can be so exciting for children. In the book Black, students will learn about the color black through different aspects of a magic show. Detailed photographs, high-frequency words, and repetitive text support early emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to visualize as well as to classify information to better understand a text.
meta: cape, sheet, stage, suit, tie, wand
